title: Is it fair?
body:
So recently I changed my name to Dύsk and ingame it appeared with problem not showing "u" correctly on a website also, like "D'YSK" :D ingame its like DIsk , support answered me that : 
VIC7ORR
January 17th 2018, 1:37:40 am
Hey there,

Thanks for your reply.

I'm afraid that as you changed your name to contain a Greek character, that character will only appear correctly if you select your game's Language to Greek :( As it is stated in the faq, special characters are allowed in some Summoner Names depending on the selected language.

I'm sorry for the bad experience, but we cannot refund you the BE used for the name change. If you want your character to be visible, you will have to change your client's language to Greek.

Let me know if you have other questions for me.

Best regards

Is it my problem that they allow me to use greek characters on english client?

replies.body: This board is designed for NA players, so overall the decision will be left up to the EU agents. Off the top of my head I would think this could be something easily fixed since, in the long run, the name change didn't work as you thought it would at first. I'd consider reaching back out to them to ask again if it'd be possible for any kind of help at all, but it will be left up to their discretion.

Sorry about that i have not noticed , So you think I am right yes? , when you pick up and check a new name its appears normally but soon you gonna find out that on a website and ingame its looks so different D'Ysk and DIsk :D close to what i picked yee sure :D
